name: HELLCARD: Prologue
description:
Hellcard: Prologue is a cooperative roguelike deckbuilder that can be played in both Singleplayer and Multiplayer modes. The prologue lets you try the portion of the main game with only a limited number of cards, artifacts, and monsters.



What makes HELLCARD unique and different from most card games is that monster placement actually matters and can be used to your advantage.



HELLCARD supports co-op battles with up to three heroes facing Archdemon’s hordes. In singleplayer mode you can descend into the dungeons solo or recruit computer-controlled companions. In multiplayer mode your friends or strangers can help you battle the hordes of hell.
